content: mini cat aknitter the pattern and finished items are for personal use only share your version of minicat on instagram #minicat #aknitter version 1 1 june 2024 materials * this pattern used dk yarn * pair of 3mm needle & spare needle the same size uk11/us2 * toy stuffing * tapestry needle * 2 black doll eyes size 3mm * pink colored pencil for cheek gauge not important if you use the same weight yarn size height approx 4cm 1 5 ins all right reserved ⓒ aknitter 1 mini cat abbreviations aknitter beak off yarn leaving a long end cast off bind off thread it through sts left on knitting b&t needle pull to gather tightly then fasten_off m stitch marker beg begin garter stitch decrease decrease g-st knitting every stitch on every row k knit ndl needle knit into the front and back to create a kf&b new stitch rs right side k2tog knit 2sts together to make one round s round s increase increase p purl repeat repeat p2tog purl 2sts together to make one rem remaining st s stitch es ws wrong side st-st stocking stitch all right reserved ⓒ aknitter 2 mini cat pattern aknitter body cast on 12sts st row1 p1row 12 row2 k2 kf&b*2 k3 kf&b*2 k3 16 row3 p1row row4 k3 kf&b*2 k5 kf&b*2 k4 20 row5~7 beg with a purl row st-st 3rows row8 k4 kf&b*2 k7 kf&b*2 k5 24 row9~11 beg with a purl row st-st 3rows row12 k4 k2tog *4 20 row13 k1row row14 k3 k2tog *4 16 row15 k4 k2tog *2 k4 14 row16 k4 k2tog k2 k2tog k4 12 row17 k2tog*6 6 b & t tail cast on 15sts st cast off all right reserved ⓒ aknitter 3 mini cat assemble aknitter ** you can view the video by scanning the qr code or clicking the qr code to assemble the body * sew using a mattress stitch * tie a knot at ends of cat s ear as shown in the video to embroider nose & mouth **minicat video full version https //youtu be/-gftidrvxki * enjoy your knitting all right reserved ⓒ aknitter 4
